channel.title: Server status page issue
channel.description:
A big issue I have with the server status page is I think it shouldn't publicly display your servers IP. This makes my server extremely vulnerable to DDOS attacks as it makes it easy to obtain the IP my server is hosted on.
Perhaps encrypt the IP and use that as an UID for the different servers?
If anybody has any ideas I'd appreciate it. I do have DDOS Protection but some attacks seems to push its limits. Thanks!

item.title: Server status page issue
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Are you serious? Anybody capable of performing denial of service attacks can easily decompile your client and then retrieve your IP address. If not that, he or she can also do it by using netstat. Hiding your IP address doesn’t make it any less vulnerable to DDOS attacks. Also, I have no idea what you mean @ UID encryption; that’s completely unrelated to your current issue.

Additionally, do you assume that your entire playerbase is consisted of morons? (well, it’s probably true, but still…).

There really is no such thing as “DDOS protection”.

Read full topic
